titleStmt.title: The Development of the Night Office in the Syrian Orthodox Breviary Šḥimō according to the Manuscripts of Mor Gabriel Monastery (1474–1900): Some Thoughts and Conclusions

revisionDesc.change: CREATED: This bibl record was autogenerated from a Zotero record.

analytic.title: The Development of the Night Office in the Syrian Orthodox Breviary Šḥimō according to the Manuscripts of Mor Gabriel Monastery (1474–1900): Some Thoughts and Conclusions

monogr.title: The Syriac Annals of the Romanian Academy

biblStruct.note: This paper offers selected material from the research master’s program I completed at Sankt Ignatios College, University College Stockholm. For completing my thesis, I have been engaged in studying the development of the night office by comparing Manuscripts of the Mor Gabriel monastery of South-Eastern Türkiye during the years 1474-1900 A.D. In this article I present some findings and conclusions from my research.

body.bibl: Andersson, Johan. “The Development of the Night Office in the Syrian Orthodox Breviary Šḥimō According to the Manuscripts of Mor Gabriel Monastery (1474–1900): Some Thoughts and Conclusions.” The Syriac Annals of the Romanian Academy 4 (2024): 29–64.

Johan Andersson, The Development of the Night Office in the Syrian Orthodox Breviary Šḥimō According to the Manuscripts of Mor Gabriel Monastery (1474–1900): Some Thoughts and Conclusions, The Syriac Annals of the Romanian Academy 4 (2024): 29–64.
